statements: SELECT * FROM medication_orders;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_orders WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, medication_name, order_date FROM medication_orders WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM medication_orders WHERE dosage > 10.5;
SELECT prescriber_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM medication_orders GROUP BY prescriber_id HAVING total_orders > 3;
SELECT * FROM medication_orders WHERE patient_id = 123 AND dosage > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_orders WHERE prescriber_id = 456 GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT DISTINCT prescriber_id, COUNT(*) FROM medication_orders GROUP BY prescriber_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT order_id, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_orders WHERE dosage BETWEEN 5 AND 15 AND order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY dosage ASC;
SELECT MAX(dosage) AS max_dosage, MIN(dosage) AS min_dosage FROM medication_orders;
SELECT * FROM MedicationOrders;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM MedicationOrders WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM MedicationOrders WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT * FROM DrugInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT medication1, medication2, description FROM DrugInteractions WHERE interaction_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM MedicationOrders WHERE patient_id = 10 ORDER BY date_ordered DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, date_ordered FROM MedicationOrders WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, date_ordered FROM MedicationOrders WHERE date_ordered BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, date_ordered FROM MedicationOrders WHERE medication_name LIKE '%aspirin%';
SELECT interaction_type, description FROM DrugInteractions WHERE medication1 = 'Paracetamol' OR medication2 = 'Ibuprofen';
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM Physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT medication_name, interaction_type FROM Medications JOIN DrugInteractions ON Medications.medication_id = DrugInteractions.medication1_id;
SELECT * FROM DrugInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE prescribing_physician_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM Medications ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM Physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM DrugInteractions WHERE medication1_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001' OR medication2_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescribing_physician_id FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medication_orders;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_orders ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE diagnosis='Diabetes';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM doctors JOIN hospitals ON doctors.hospital_id = hospitals.hospital_id;
SELECT * FROM medication_orders WHERE prescribing_doctor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM medication_orders WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY medication_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE hospital_id = 3 ORDER BY doctor_name
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescribing_doctor_id FROM medication_orders WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE diagnosis='Cancer') ORDER BY medication_name
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals WHERE hospital_id < 4 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM medication_orders ORDER BY prescription_date DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_orders WHERE dosage > 50
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT medication_1, medication_2, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 1
SELECT physician_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM physicians
SELECT * FROM medication_orders WHERE patient_id = 1001
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM medication_orders ORDER BY prescription_date DESC
SELECT physician_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology'
SELECT interaction_id, medication_1, medication_2, LEFT(interaction_description, 50) AS short_description FROM drug_interactions
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, location FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age ASC
